I think the issue is that the calculation of

fraction_offset = int(1 / ((1 - central_fraction) / 2.0))

will magnify the deviation if the accuracy of central_fraction is low. Thus causing (240, 320, 3) * 0.33 to be (0, 0, 3)

Created a PR #12239 for this issue.

body:
I think the issue is that the calculation of
```
fraction_offset = int(1 / ((1 - central_fraction) / 2.0))
```
will magnify the deviation if the accuracy of central_fraction is low. Thus causing `(240, 320, 3)` * 0.33 to be `(0, 0, 3)`

Created a PR #12239 for this issue.
